xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/309989-A Union in Wait 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bH0hPfaarGjG1FwcTeqFsen2jis.jpg This affecting documentary relates the struggle of two Baptist women, Susan Parker and Wendy Scott, to seal their domestic union in a chapel on the campus of Wake Forest University -- a crusade that generated national controversy in the late 1990s. A Union in Wait
